post:
Hello all!

We're back with a new and different offer with dedicated servers starting from just $20/mo in LAX, DFW and MIA. If the offers below aren't up to your requirements please just contact one of our sales staff and we can provide a whole host of options.

Be aware all servers are manually setup and it may take up to 3 business days.

##__**Our i3 sale**__
###__Los Angeles__
<pre>
Intel i3-530
16GB DDR3 RAM
1TB HDD
10TB Bandwidth @ 1Gbit
1Gbit private network
/29 IPv4, /64 IPv6</pre>
$25/mo (first 5 available at $20/mo with code G4U43LW5XX, limited to 1 discount use per client) - [Order here](https://my.stockservers.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=198&currency=2)

###__Miami__
<pre>
Intel i3-2130 (or similar)
8GB DDR3 RAM
1TB HDD
10TB Bandwidth @ 1Gbit
1Gbit private network
/29 IPv4, /64 IPv6</pre>
$25/mo - [Order here](https://my.stockservers.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=200&currency=2)

##Location Information

LAX - Test IP (69.12.66.26/2607:fcd0:0:a::2) - Test Files ([100MB](http://repos.lax-noc.com/speedtests/100mb.bin) [1GB](http://repos.lax-noc.com/speedtests/1gb.bin))  
MIA - Test IP (173.44.32.10/2607:ff48:0:a:b:c:d:666) - Test Files ([100MB](http://repos.mia.lax-noc.com/speedtests/100mb.bin) [1GB](http://repos.mia.lax-noc.com/speedtests/1gb.bin))   
DFW - Test IP (96.44.142.2/2607:fcd0:daaa:daaa:daaa:daaa:daaa:daaa) - Test Files ([100MB](http://repos.dfw.lax-noc.com/speedtests/100mb.bin) [1GB](http://repos.dfw.lax-noc.com/speedtests/1gb.bin))

##Additional Information

All services benefit from Quadranets 3Gbit VEST DDoS protection and benefit from their enterprise grade network. All services are eligible for BGP sessions and bring your own IP. Our in-house server control panel is currently not available and is being worked on and should be ready in ~2 weeks to allow users to reboot, reinstall and manage their IPs. 

If you have any questions please ask!
